website_summaries.verdict: Oval-shaped watch face is much smaller than most sport watch faces. Comes at a desirable price point.
pros: Owners like the smaller than average watch face for a women's sport watch
Good set of basic features for a sport watch
cons: Alarm volume is too low to be heard by heavy sleepers

customer_reviews.title: Good watch.
customer_reviews.text: Love it, small and dainty, fits my tiny wrist, cute girls watch. I like that it shows the date and what day it is, I didnt like that it didnt come with a screen protector on top or bottom like most watches do, I usually leave it on until it falls off. Got some scratches on it from work after a day of having it ! :( but good watch other than that. Tried to take pics from all angles so you can see the actual size, good watch for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tiny Watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a watch for a 5 year old. It's tiny and impossible to read date especially for the elderly recipient. The time is shown in large enough numbers. Watch came one hour fast. I spent a long time trying to set it to the proper time without success. I can't print a return label as I can't afford copier ink. Afraid this one goes in the dumpster!
customer_reviews.author: Don Martin

customer_reviews.title: Bought two, both lasted less than 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these watches, one for each of my daughters. First watch broke the wrist band within the first two months and there are no pins to allow you to replace the band. It's no longer wearable. The second watch just stopped working after about three months. Most likely due to a dead battery, just went blank.
customer_reviews.author: M. Emaus

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to set.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to set the time, even with included (very small print) instructions. I tried several times to hold down the specified buttons and just could not figure out how to set it. Not worth the trouble if I cannot figure out how to set a "simple" watch.
customer_reviews.author: Hawes Family

customer_reviews.title: Could you include a magnifying glass?
customer_reviews.text: Once again I stupidly ordered something that included instructions that are so very tiny that the average person would have issues reading. Obviously this means that this watch is TRASHED because I cannot read the teeny tiny print to figure out how to set the time. Armitron - Complete Failure. I'm going back to a retailer who can either provide a PDF or decent instructions that can be read without the benefit of halogen lights and strong magnifying glasses. You're losing a target group. Enjoy that.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I got this watch out to set and pack for an overseas trip. I had ordered it a few months in advance based on the representations that it would display both US time and time in a different time zone. The buttons (A-D) do not work to set the watch. I took the watch into a jewelry store to be sure I was attempting to set it up correctly. The owner verified that the buttons do not work. The time has passed for me to return it. I hope you can benefit from the mistake that I made in purchasing this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Miyah

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a watch in general, and finally decided to be realistic and purchase one that was digital and waterproof instead of going for the fashionable watches. So glad I got this one. It works great! I'm constantly getting water on it and it's fine. I love how it has the seconds in view and has the days date. This watch really saves you from looking at your phone, getting distracted and forgetting that you meant to check the time. Would buy another watch from here. My friend and I have the same one right now and it's pretty cute.
customer_reviews.author: Leziga

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this watch to have the time and an alarm for a cruise. Wore it for a week before leaving on the cruise and the day before the cruise it died! Had already left home and was stuck without a watch and an alarm!!! Did not drop or even get the watch wet!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen E

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: perfect size for someone with tiny wrists. I have a hard time finding a watch that doesn't look big and clunky, but is also water proof. This one is perfect. I teach swim lessons 4 days a week and I swim regularly. I needed something that I didn't have to take off all the time for cleaning or showering or teaching. I've had it for about 6 months and it is still working beautifully. The band discolors very quickly and mine has a dirty copper tone to it these days (I bought it in white) but it doesn't bother me, as I wear a lot of bracelets anyway, so it is relatively hidden.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Just Buy It
customer_reviews.text: I have a very nice waterproof Citizen watch, but I wanted a waterproof sporty watch that could get a little banged up without me being devastated. This watch is it. It actually looks very nice, works great, and is holding up perfectly. I've gone river tubing, swimming, in the shower...you name it...it's still ticking. It's not overly large or sporty like a lot of digital watches, nor is it trying to mimic the style of an Apple watch. It has a timer functions and counts laps, although I haven't used either of those functions yet. Totally worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Really Cute!
customer_reviews.text: My watch arrived today, only 4 days after ordering it. It came preset with the time, date and running. I love this watch. It's the perfect size, fits my 6-inch wrist very well with lots of room for a larger one. I have no problem seeing the time without searching for glasses. I was worried about this because I'm 71 and the eyes are not as good as they used to be. I got the black one and I'm totally in love with it. Goes with everything!
customer_reviews.author: ChynaWinter

customer_reviews.title: Virtually impossible to re-set time
customer_reviews.text: Last fall I gave up and my spouse spent 20 minutes essentially doing the various combinations of the buttons over and over until one finally kicked in and made it possible to leave daylight savings time. The fact that it "works" doing something you have already tried multiple times shows something is completely arbitrary in there. This morning (changing to DST) he said as cheap as this watch is, I should just buy another one. I would IF there were a way to be sure it would be on DST. Nice little watch but virtually impossible to reset the time.
customer_reviews.author: Gulfcoaster

customer_reviews.title: Great dainty sports watch
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a dainty sports watch to wear when biking/kayaking/etc. Most sport watches are large and bulky, which isn't really my style. This watch fit all my criteria: small watch face, digital with date, water resistant, and has a backlight. It also has several other features that may be useful to you- including a stop watch, alarm, and a second time screen (you can program this to show a different time, for example if you had family that lived in another timezone and wanted to know their time). I've had this watch for a month now and haven't had any issues. I also bought an Amazon Warehouse return to bring the price down an extra few dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: NIce to find a woman's digital that's not huge and also attractive
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these watches for YEARS - probably at least 10 years. They're reliable and easy to deal with. They'll last for a few years. My last one was probably at least 3 years old. The watch itself was still functioning but I had to replace it because the strap failed. Getting a replacement strap from Armitron is possible but will cost you as much as a new watch! I recommend these watches, though, as it is hard to find a smaller, women's digital that isn't clunkly looking, etc. Also like the color selections. The navy with gold trim is what I just bought to replace the old one and it's very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine O. Mechem

customer_reviews.title: Edited to add....Update:  wore the watch swimming for about an hour almost every day, all summer long, and it is still working,.
customer_reviews.text: In the summertime I swim in a lake for exercise, and I wanted a waterproof watch so I could check the time if need be. Was slightly worried as this was only billed as "water resistant", but I wore it swimming yesterday for an hour with no problems. The time numerals are large enough for me to read with with out my "cheater" reading glasses (I usually were either 1.5 or 2.0 magnifiers) which is exactly what I needed. I can't make out the smaller date & second numbers without the glasses, but that's not an issue for me. Love the color, it's comfortable, lightweight, and sporty without looking totally cheap.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Less Expensive Is Better, Sometime
customer_reviews.text: I went with my gut, "can't beat a old classic like a Timex"! But, Hold the phone, bc now that's a false statement! I purchased this one, "Armatron"! So glad I did. Not what I thought was a "run with the market"! Not so. I've gotten it wet washing my hands sev'L times/day. My other water resistant "Classic" just didn't, couldn't make it past 2 months! Who gets to a heart store to fix a classic, esp water? Now, this beautifully readable (with/without) glasses Beats a Timex! I really like my Armatron! Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Mary929W

customer_reviews.title: I wear it every day
customer_reviews.text: About a year ago my watch broke so I got this to replace it. I wear it constantly except for in the shower or pool; I haven't really tested its water-resistant capabilities but I do wear it while I wash the dishes so it has to be decent anyway. It's small and comfortable. The watch face now has a few scratches on it, but you can only see them in certain lightings. I don't remember what the manual said but it's pretty easy to mess around with the buttons and get it to do what you want. I'd definitely recommend it and the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Works great for swimming laps
customer_reviews.text: I use this watch for swimming as our winter pool does not have a clock. (long story, not relevant) This watch works great, looks attractive, and is just the ticket for that purpose. You could easily wear this full time, but I use my fitbit for that. I had a little trouble setting the time, but did finally figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch. Don't quit making it.
customer_reviews.text: I hope Armitron doesn't quit making this watch. I just got it today and I'm very impressed. I like that it's a nice face. I love the blue light that illuminates the time and date. I like that I can the day and the day of the week, and that I can press a button to see the month, day, and year. It's easy to set up. I also like the second time on it.
customer_reviews.author: Tinabop187

customer_reviews.title: It looks great on
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! I have a lot of compliments on this watch. I think it's the color of the watch and the way the watch head looks but it looks great on. It has keep great time. I normally don't wear watches but decided I needed to and this one caught my eye. I love it!! I have done dishes with it and have showered with it on and have had no problems. I might even need to get another one as a backup because it seems when I find something I really like, they quit making it. I love the price too!!
customer_reviews.author: Live Outside

customer_reviews.title: Kid approved👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6year old daughter because she can tell time and is practicing better time management. She wanted this one because it is a rose gold like my Casio. It was a reasonable price to pay for a watch for a kid plus the benefit of it being better quality those other watches marketed for kids. The watch face is small enough to not overwhelm her tiny wrist and no issues being able to read the numbers. It was also easy to set and wrapped around her wrist all the way without hanging over. Overall it was a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Good, consider strap wear & tear
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to wear when my garmin is charging or I want a nice look but still want a watch. Really love the timer function. Cute, good size, it's cheap plastic that I'm sure will crack at some point. I like the color a it -the cream and gold- but the strap is starting to get dirty/brownish from where it rubs on the desk or whatever. Not so happy about that. I've had it for about 3 months and wear it probably 50% of the time I have on a watch. Can be worn in shower safely, but I wont even try it in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Meg S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these watches, one in the teal and one in silver. I wear one or the other every day. Considering the price, they have stood the test of time! My only "issue" is that sometimes the buttons get pressed to easily, so it'll turn on the alarm or turn to military time. The nice thing is that if something were to happen to this watch, it wouldn't be a big deal because of the price! I plan to keep buying it in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good little watch
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good little watch overall. The watch itself (Not the band but the quadrant) is a little smaller than what it looks like in the pictures, which I appreciated actually. The only reason why I’m taking off a star is that I purchased the rose gold one and the quadrant has the rose gold details but then the buckle, with which you close the band, is silver. So it makes it all look a little fake/funny. I wish they kept the same metal color for all the metal parts of the watch. Overall a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Vi Kuz

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE & NO CUSTOMER SERVICE!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS!! You can't set it; followed all the instructions and it does it's own thing; likes the way it was! I called Customer Service (non-existent) and was on hold for 30 minutes and then they cut me off!! Called Amazon and they're letting me return it; thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: Great watch so far! Still loving it!
customer_reviews.text: So far the watch is awesome! It looks good and not cheap, the band is comfortable and there are plenty of holes to adjust size, I work in an operating room and am always washing my hands and it takes the beatings just fine. I’ve only had the watch for close to two weeks and will update if anything goes amiss. Overall it’s a good buy if you need a small, lightweight, waterproof decent looking watch. Update: it’s still beautiful and works flawlessly! It has since gotten a little beat up, but it’s not a Kevlar wristwatch.
customer_reviews.author: TForrest30

customer_reviews.title: Battery lasted 1 week so I lost my $$ & my time.
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about this adorable little watch that I purchased for my 7 year old daughter to help with her homeschooling until the battery stopped working after only 1 week. I thought it would be easy to switch out the battery, but it actually isn’t. It has 4 tiny screws & 2 microscopic screws on the inside. There is no way a could screw ur back on. So I threw $18 out the window. So annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Kenia Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This watch is amazing! I absolutely hate the look for sports watches, I think they're too big and chunky on my smaller wrist. This is amazing, though. It's small enough that it seems to suit me. It's got a 2 times option which is amazing for someone like me with family in a different timezone. I've only showered, washed my hands, and washed dishes with it so I can't speak on water resistance while swimming but so far it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Alma

customer_reviews.title: Missing the countdown timer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for 2 reasons, military time and a countdown timer. This has only one of the features despite stating on the packaging that it has both. It came with instructions however they were a bit jumbled up in terms of layout so i had a hard time figuring out what blurb went with what section. After about 20+ minutes i finally figured it out and have it set up. It is a nice watch for people who have a more child-like wrist size. So far not so bad, just wish it had the countdown timer so whrn i have to do respirations i had something a bit easier to go off of.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Watch!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to get this watch since it didn't have many reviews but I'm so glad I did! I'm working at an aquarium over the summer and I have my arms in salt water tanks many times throughout the day and this watch has held up great! I also just went to the beach and it survived the ocean and the pool. The color is just like the picture and the size is perfect, especially for a small woman's wrist (the face doesn't take up the entire wrist like other watches). It's fairly easy to set up and works well. All in all I'd say it's an amazing watch for this price!
customer_reviews.author: SDROW

customer_reviews.title: Light weight watch
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with my purchase of this watch. It is light weight and looks nice. The display is large and easy to see. I use a stop watch often at work and this feature is easy to use and convenient. The watch is prettier than most other watches with a stop watch feature. The only thing to consider is that the band is not super long. My wrists are not very big (about 6.25 inches) and there are only 2 or 3 additional holes in the strap, depending on how tight I wear it. So not a lot of additional size, if your wrists are bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Pen

customer_reviews.title: Fits a small wrist
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a watch that would fit. My wrist measures 5.5 inches around. I hook the band in the third to the last hole. I love the face. The day and date are easy to reat at the top of the face. The directions were easy to use to set the time, which is the main function that I'll use. I haven't had the watch very long, but so far would definitely recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: doesnt last in water
customer_reviews.text: this was good while it lasted. the grey part got dingy after a while. Im a lifeguard and i got this for pool duty and it is not water resistant/proof. it broke after getting into the water for a save.
customer_reviews.author: Hope Wellington

customer_reviews.title: A great straightforward  watch for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple watch that is easy to read, easy to set, and has the important functions: time (including seconds), day, year, timer, alarm, and illuminating backlight for a fantastic price. No it won't show you the tides, the lunar eclipse, the next total solar eclipse, or your horoscope. it is just a good straightforward watch for which I have discarded my Polar and Nixon watches.
customer_reviews.author: weiss

customer_reviews.title: Very nice-looking watch with lots of features
customer_reviews.text: This watch looks even better than I thought it would. It's not oversized and is comfortable to wear. It's easy to read the time. Using the directions, I had no trouble setting up all the features the way I wanted them. Everything seems to work as advertised. After an extended snorkeling trip, I'll know about the water resistance. I cannot go along with the watch being "unisex" though. I asked my son if he would ever wear it or if he thought any of his friends would and he just looked at me as if I were from another planet. It's a fairly feminine watch, without being "girly." I highly recommend this watch to any female!
customer_reviews.author: fortherelax

customer_reviews.title: a nice little watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself, I was looking for a watch that just counted my steps, no extra bells or whistles. So I did wear it a few times it is nice and light and keeps time pretty well. I did end up giving it to my 9 year grand daughter who promptly pushed all the buttons... well what does this do.. to get the watch all back is sink was a real pain.. but kids that age just need a watch that sets the time only.. no frills!
customer_reviews.author: Jinny12

customer_reviews.title: I have only had thiswatch for a few days but I really like it
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this watch for a few days but I really like it. Its funny I got a movado watch as a gift ( I said I needed a watch for xmas) Well it was way 2 fancy. I love it for a night out but its not easy to tell the time. They have no numbers on the face. So I got this nice 20 dollar watch and its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Fhockey28

customer_reviews.title: Tiny watch
customer_reviews.text: If you have a tiny wrist, this is the watch for you. It’s adjustable down to a tiny size. The watch itself is also super small. This picture compares it to a Fitbit Alta HR. I actually ended up returning it because the face was so small that I found it a little hard to see. However, it seemed like a decent watch and definitely wins in the not-being-bulky department. Nice-looking, too.
customer_reviews.author: Atticus Potter

customer_reviews.title: Don't get this color- the band turns.
customer_reviews.text: Band discolored in a couple of weeks. I'll be returning because of that. I did repurchase in purple. I love the slim design, directions are not for this watch. Fiddle around, it's not too hard to figure out. I'm over 50 and got it. LoL It comes preset, so depending on your time zone you may luck out!! Just don't get this color.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. My previous sports watch broke so I was looking for something else but less bulky. The two things I particularly wanted were a back light - for checking the time in the night - and it being waterproof enough to stand up to swimming and going in the shower. This watch has exceeded my expectations, meeting both these needs but also being very attractive to look at, more like a normal watch than a sports watch. It's small (definitely more for a lady than a man) and I've ended up wearing it for everyday needs not just for the gym etc. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: GREAT WATCH, BUT DO NOT BUY FROM THIS SELLER
customer_reviews.text: Watch was clearly not new- didn't come with a protective plastic shield on the watch face. It wasn't attached to the packaging. And it DIED one minute after putting it on. Returned... Don't buy from this seller. I love the watch itself. I had one for years. But it broke and I wanted to replace it. I will buy this watch again, but not from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki Del Toro

customer_reviews.title: Great little watch!
customer_reviews.text: This is a petite, lightweight watch. I wear it every day and rarely take it off. I shower with it, swim with it, bang my arm against things — it holds up well. I had to YouTube directions as to how to set the alarm and change the time as I threw the directions out on accident. The backlight is really helpful for evenings and early mornings and the date is a nice feature as well. I don’t have any complaints about this watch, it was worth the $18 and I’m pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: eeebrrr

customer_reviews.title: Poor directions, OK watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch because of the plastic band (allergies) and the backlight. I have no need for stop watch, split time, etc. My biggest complaints are the teeny little symbols that appear to be alarm and A or P, and the fact that the instructions are poorly organized and the diagram does not match the directions. Once I figured that the button labeled D on the instructions was actually C in the functions and that the setting instructions began on the last page and ended on the first page of the booklet, it was easier. The watch does what I need, is not as clunky as many others, and the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: normac

customer_reviews.title: It still works fine after surviving several months of mom-life
customer_reviews.text: Functionally, this watch has done just what I needed without too many bells and whistles. The upper right side button (ST/STP) tends to stick a little (it has ever since I first got it) and I have to press very hard to get it to work. It still works fine after surviving several months of mom-life, dish water, etc., though the face is moderately scratched. Aesthetically, I like the size, but would chose a darker color rather than the pink/rose-gold that I got if I were to get it again; this is because the band is actually more of a white than the face and has become stained, greyish, and dingy with wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loses Time Quickly
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: after only 4 months it’s losing time badly enough that I’m returning it. Very unhappy. The numbers are big, the fit is comfortable, the buttons are easy to press and the time and date are simple to change. The light is bright but not blinding, and changing it to and from military time is simple as well. I have found my new favorite watch. It isn’t bulky, and takes to showers well. I literally couldn’t ask for a better watch. I have small wrists, so despite being slimmer than I was expecting, it actually fits even better than I hoped!
customer_reviews.author: Bren

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR SMALL WRISTS!
customer_reviews.text: This watch arrived quickly and was already set up as far as time/date! It's very pretty and feminine. I have the rose gold and pink color and the pink is a rosy cream color. If you have small wrists, this is the perfect size for a dainty sports watch. I've only had it on for a few hours but so far it has not picked up any dust or dirt around the silicone band. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: ambar

customer_reviews.title: Extraordinarily unclear how to change settings
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch, but don’t recommend it because it is almost impossible to figure out how to change time and alarm settings, and the instructions are pathetic. I have to live with an alarm going off daily — one I do not want. If the company would hire a native English speaker who knows how to write clear instructions, this would be an awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen T. Levine

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Update: my daughter has found that in hot weather her watch resets itself. It keeps changing back to 12:00 and we have to reprogram it. Too bad, because she loved it! My daughter LOVES this watch! She raves about it constantly! She loves the color, the look, the design, the friendly usability... great value! Glad we chose this one!
customer_reviews.author: Trin

customer_reviews.title: I loved this watch when I received it
customer_reviews.text: I loved this watch when I received it, but within a week it stopped keeping accurate time. It is always 5 minutes behind. I know that, so I plan accordingly, but it makes me sad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable When Wet and Color Changes
customer_reviews.text: The watch is well-priced, looks good, and does everything it claims to do. My only issue with it is that it kind of irritates my skin when it gets a bit wet from splashes while washing my hand (even when I try my best to avoid getting water on it). The band also started turning blue from rubbing against my navy jacket sleeve (windbreaker material). I am not sure if this is because of the material of the watch or the jacket, but I have never had any issues with my jacket bleeding color before. Overall, it's still a good purchase for the price and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Chi

customer_reviews.title: I got this as a gift and she loved it
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my best friend because she likes digital watches but can't find a cute one. I got her this because it is small and cute but also digital. It looks great on her. She is a very small person so it doesn't overwhelm her and blends in nicely with whatever outfit she chooses to wear. She wears it every day and it looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Barnaby

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again! Versatile.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Stylish, sleek, and versatile. I needed a waterproof watch to get me away from my phone but keep up with time anywhere I am. I took it for a swim in the ocean and kept it on while washing the dog. All good! Bought it open-box, so no manual. Still pretty simple to set once you figure it out. I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: dianne

customer_reviews.title: Petite watch for a petite frame
customer_reviews.text: I am very petite and did not want a large, bulky outdoor/sport watch. I love the mint green color and the watch itself is adorable and feminine in size and shape. The watch does come with instructions and while they are not perfectly described in great detail, it is easy enough to figure out how to use all of the functions and turn alarms, chimes, and beepers off or on. The watch is very comfortable and does not move around or get hot/sweaty when running around in the summer or washing dishes. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: Armitron is my new Timex
customer_reviews.text: I love these watches and own Many of them in different colors, they wear well and last a long time. Occationally they are hard to figure out how to change from 12 to 24 hr function, and instructions aren't always clear. But I have it down pat, the illumination is great and is easily set for time changes.
customer_reviews.author: ButtsBaby

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: I am a paramedic that works all hours day/night. I purchased this watch because it is water proof, shows the day, date and the time can be in military time. I love that I can scrub up after a call with the watch on. It also has a light so that I can see the time in the dark. It is a great watch especially for the price! If this watch gets destroyed I will definitely order a new one like it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. It’s a beautiful color and size for her wrist, as she is 11. She loves how it’s waterproof and can set a timer. The only thing I can say that’s not 5 star, is that the color is fading where it clasps together. It looks like the color is worn off. The top side however is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Good Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good watch for the price!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, it's been on my wrist 24/7 for about a week and my only complaint is that the screen scratched really easy within 24 hours. It's been a long time since I had a basic sports watch so I'm struggling with knowing how to use all the functions without consulting the instructions, so not totally intuitive on that front. I've been swimming almost everyday for an hour and worn it in the shower and doing dishes and no glitches thus far!
customer_reviews.author: busybeingbecca

customer_reviews.title: A Watch Every Active Woman Should Have
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! It is just what I was looking for. I have a dressier watch, but needed one I could comfortably and safely wear working in the yard, cleaning, washing dishes and my hands numerous times a day, etc., one that doesn't mind a little grit and splash of water from time to time. This watch is a true work horse with numerous capabilities, a two-year warranty and a low price of $17. Who could ask for more?
customer_reviews.author: Donna Hudspeth

customer_reviews.title: The alarm is loud enough that it wakes her up and she's a pretty sound sleeper
customer_reviews.text: Got this watch for my daughter who needs an alarm for herself as a camp counselor and also needs a waterproof watch. The alarm is loud enough that it wakes her up and she's a pretty sound sleeper. But it's not too loud. Also, she wears it lifeguarding and in the shower. It's waterproof in those situations.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lou

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed! Adorable and functional
customer_reviews.text: Great basic watch. I needed a plain watch to just keep time when I’m out and about (perhaps without my iPhone) but wanted something cute too. Works great, is adorable and I can wear it in the shower, to bed etc- exactly what I needed. Easy to use, has a glow light feature for nighttime.
customer_reviews.author: smileyface_girl

customer_reviews.title: Love this inexpensive watch!
customer_reviews.text: I have really small wrists so most digital/sporty type watches look like man-watches on me but this one is cute and sleek. I have purple and will probably buy another. I love that I can read it easily in the sunlight as I use its stopwatch function outside often. It came with instructions and was simple enough that I could adjust time and learn how to use stopwatch and alarm function. It also has a cool backlight button for reading in the dark. I’ve only had it two weeks now but have used it everyday. Hope it lasts!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa N

customer_reviews.title: Holding up in hot water
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a little while now and because I am pregnant I've taken alot of hot baths and it still works great. My only complaint is where the buttons are located. You want to push the light button but I always end up pushing the button directly across from it then have to fiddle just to get the time in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch - Band is A Little Small
customer_reviews.text: This is a great watch if you're looking for something you can wear when you go swimming. I bought it exclusively for our trips to Jamaica. I wore it swimming in the pool, ocean, and snorkeling. No issues. Works great - super happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: tonyatn81

customer_reviews.title: Not bulky or too small.
customer_reviews.text: I break everything and I’ve had this one long enough to say I’d get it again when I manage to break it. I swim, hike, run, climb, and I’m no ninja so I tend to break stuff. This survived a trip to the ocean, landscaping, and eating **** while running with a dog on a leash. I do rip my hair out a lot with it, that’s my only complaint but I’m sure it I wore it on the left arm I’d be fine, but I wont...
customer_reviews.author: Alison R.

customer_reviews.title: Pass, and buy a different watch
customer_reviews.text: Not happy. Watch came with battery already running, so not sure how long it’s been. Looking inside to find out replace battery is a pain, requires short circuiting it to restart it after battery is replaced. Directions not clear. Pass and buy a different watch
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: Good for petite wrist
customer_reviews.text: Like some other reviewers said, if you have a smaller wrist, this watch is GREAT. It fits much more proportionately. I have had two previous timex ironman women's watches, both worn out, and so far I like this Armitron BETTER because of 1) size - fits me better; 2) for some reason it's just easier to read and easier for me to use the functions; 3) the light - I always struggled to see the time after dark with the Timex Ironman because it was just backlit. On the Armitron, the digits actually light up, making it super easy to see in the dark, even without my cheaters, LOL!!!
customer_reviews.author: MotoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife who administers a lot of physical therapy in pools so she needed a water resistant watch. This works great and she thinks it's cute. The numbers are easy to read, there's a stop watch, you can do military or regular time, the light is bright. All in all she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Drew T.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LITTLE BACKPACKING WATCH!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the wife to use while hiking. It is super lightweight, and the time display is big! Yes it is a rubber band, but it will last, and the face is actually very classy and feminine looking. It is a smaller watch than we thought it was, which makes it truly look like a ladies watch. Very nice. For the money, this is a fantastic timepiece! If it were priced at $70, I would still give it a full 4 stars!
customer_reviews.author: DN

customer_reviews.title: Best water resistant watch ever
customer_reviews.text: I literally wear this watch 24/7. I work with kids and time is something I need to know. Gotta keep with the schedules. I have worn it in the pool all summer and swimming lessons, wear it in the shower and always get it wet from the dishes or washing my hands. Its definitely lived up to the water resistant claim. It has gotten very discolored from the chlorine and over all wear. Im going to be ordering a new one soon. I dont use the watch for any other function than time telling. So im not sure how well the alarms work.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing this for a couple months and never take it off. It’s been through showers, baths and even wore it to Bahamas where I swam in ocean, pools and water park ... is in perfect condition and no leaks. Band did discolor slightly darker but I think I did something to it; not sure that would happen to everyone
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Seems nice.
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice watch, looks pretty, seems to keep time well. The buttons for setting the time, etc., are easier to use than some I have had; they're bigger but flat so they don't get in the way. It's a very small watch; would not fit a large wrist, and I'm not sure how durable the band will prove to be.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I put this watch on when I got it and have not taken it off since then. This watch is fashionable and comfortable and keeps perfect time. I have showered with it on and I swam with it in the Caribbean waters. No moisture entered the watch and it kept on ticking. And, best of all, I don't have to take it off, put it on, etc.
customer_reviews.author: betty

customer_reviews.title: Nice Size for a Small Wrist
customer_reviews.text: I like the watch and it fits well on my small wrist. I would have given it 5 Stars, however, the instructions are not very clear. Its finally set up but I dread resetting everything when I change the battery. Positive - I was able to set the secondary time to my destination and thats a nice feature. Took me forever to figure it out though.
customer_reviews.author: JaneW

customer_reviews.title: 12 year old daughter loves this watch
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wore this watch for a couple of years til the band finally broke. She wanted to get the exact same watch rather than a different one. Bummer there is no replacement band, but it's also inexpensive, so I guess that is ok except the waste. :(
customer_reviews.author: MLoHo

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Needed a waterproof watch for work to keep track of time. I’ve worn it in the shower several times and it still works. Needed the directions to figure out how to use every feature, as this was not intuitive. The alarm kept going off and I couldn’t figure out why, finally found the directions again and disarmed it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: High school daughter is a "watch person", loves this watch
customer_reviews.text: My daughter requires a watch at every moment. Her old one broke, so I let her pick her own from a few found on Amazon. She swims, wanted a timer, wanted it to show the date for exhausted mornings, liked the color... this met all of her very particular needs. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mitzel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good watch. Nice color. Hard to set initially though
customer_reviews.text: The color is on point. A powder blue band with gold embellishments is a correct description for it. It is comfortable on my wrist. It was hard to set initially though. I had to look it up on You tube to get it because the instructions are in very small print. Other than that, I am happy with it. Oh, just one more note this actually takes 3 days after ordering it to get to you just so you know. It was late on delivery but that wound up being fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Cupples

customer_reviews.title: Nice but too small/tight
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch for the price but it barely fits my wrist....so warning not for larger boned women....I’m going to see if it works or fits on my daughter since it is pretty and works fine but if not I’ll probably return it...it’s just too tight and no room to make a custom hole to make it less tight in me.
customer_reviews.author: Jill M Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: Water resistance
customer_reviews.text: I work at inside the kitchen so am constantly using water or heat. It works perfectly and it’s water Resisten, it took me a while to get used to the functions but it’s good in everything. I’m thinking on buying another 3 or 4 for my family.
customer_reviews.author: Maura Rogel

customer_reviews.title: Cute Watch- 2nd purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Armitron watch and I love it!! Size and color are perfect if you have a smaller and more slender wrist. I had to watch a YouTube video to set the time as the instructions are a bit confusing, but overall for price, this is a beautiful quality watch. A+
customer_reviews.author: KatJ

customer_reviews.title: Good watch if you don't mind a few issues.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of the watch but, there are few problems with it. Setting the time, date is not easy. It took me 2 days just to get everything correct. I didn't stop quick enough, went to 2020 had to push the 99 times to correct. Also It beeps every hour i have tried everything to stop it and can't. The band is very small!!!
customer_reviews.author: tmow

customer_reviews.title: Dim and small display
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my elderly mother who needed the date and time. She liked the style, but found the numbers too small on the date, and the the numbers are pale compared to a Times digital watch we eventually got for her. Also, her wrists are small, and the watch portion is long and stiff. This made it hard for her to position the watch on her wrist comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Frogwar23

customer_reviews.title: Great for EMS providers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to wear while I'm on duty as an EMT. It was a royal pain to get the time and date set, but I love it now that it's all set up. It displays the seconds large enough to make getting heart and respiratory rates easy. And since it's waterproof I don't have the worry about it getting messy while I'm with patients.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa B.

customer_reviews.title: Great women's casual watch
customer_reviews.text: Nice trim sport watch a nice change from all the rather bulky ones out there. I need a rugged watch and it has to be waterproof because I have a farm and am always getting wet watering, filling troughs, washing animals etc. This one fills the bill but looks nice enough to wear all the time, I'm not sure I would call it unisex, I think most men would find it a bit small - especially the band. There are only three more holes to go larger than I wear.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret T.

customer_reviews.title: Watch good.  Band NOT ok
customer_reviews.text: Watch is doing well. The band, however, is NOT. The band changed color to a grey/black except where the clasp meets and the band-holder sits. This is not due to lotions as I use only natural humectants. Cannot replace the band. So I'm stick with a pretty face and an ugly band that looks like its dirty. 😣
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied but allergic
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch but sadly whatever the band is made of has caused rashes to form around my wrist. I switched the watch to my other wrist and the same thing happened. Unfortunately its not safe for me to wear anymore. Other then my personal issues with this watch I'd still recommend this watch. I'm a professional dog groomer and this watch withstood over a 100 baths, id shower with it on, do dishes, clean fish tanks and never had an issue with it not working. If it wasn't for my allergic reaction to the material I'd give this watch 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Shayshay

customer_reviews.title: Great Sports Watch....
customer_reviews.text: Always using sports watches as I exercise outdoors only, go hiking, go on vacations around the outdoors, etc. This is water resistant as long as you don't go underwater. I have been caught in the rain many times and it is still working great. Also, plastic is great for duration and durable.
customer_reviews.author: SouthFloridaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I love Armitron watches and this one does not disappoint! Having VERY TINY wrists, it's difficult for me to find a quality watch that will fit. It's hooked into the very last hole, but it's perfect; no overhang with the band, as it fits into the sliding tab. The band is not hard; it's soft and comfortable. I love everything about it!
customer_reviews.author: tm628

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is elegant in a way I had only ever hoped for before. It isn’t clunky and big like other watches. It gives me everything I need!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Jaquay

customer_reviews.title: Screen unreadable after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I loved the size and fit of this watch. I really liked how narrow it was and easy to read. But... 6 months later and the screen is only visible in tiny areas and not readable. Until now it was working well. Another BIG con for me is that it didn't have a timer, just a stopwatch. I like having a watch timer for when my kids are in time out. Back to hunting for the perfect slim watch...
customer_reviews.author: D. Jelte

customer_reviews.title: It does it job expertly
customer_reviews.text: I exercise for 30 minutes in a Seattle lake year-round and needed a watch that could withstand the water and that I could easily track my time. I tied the watch to my vest and have exercised in the lake for the last 2 months and it's done everything I wanted. Good purchase, great price. One point, it is not unisex. My husband would never buy it. It's a small watch and too feminine looking. Good enough looking to wear daily.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch to use during nursing school and it was so awesome! A little confusing at first because of the buttons but I got the hang out it. My only issue was that it would pick up the pen marks from papers and then the marks wouldn't clean off so easily. My watch is now (2 yrs later) an orangish/pink color but still works great and has lasted many handwashings. It's also small enough that it doesn't hurt when doing compressions. Would definitely buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not my curve
customer_reviews.text: The curvature of the band bits attached to the face doesn’t match my curvature, so the watch always ends up riding with the face pointing outwards from my outer wrist bone. The buttons are also extremely touchy, & I’m continually making them beep & going into other modes. Works great beyond that, but I wish I’d kept the box so I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenspice

customer_reviews.title: Well made, good for young children
customer_reviews.text: This watch is durable and well made. I got it for my 2 kiddos ages 6 & 8 to use to remind them when they need to get ready for their swim lessons. They have worn it in the pool for 4 months, dropped it, stepped on it, and it still is working perfectly! In fact my son left it in his pocket and it ended up going thru the washer and dryer and it still works. Mind you I don't recommend you try that!
customer_reviews.author: ILovePrime!

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, dressier than most sports watch
customer_reviews.text: I can wear it running and wear it to the office... functional yet small and fancy looking. I love it! I am rough on watches- wear them 24 hours a day, in water, while sweating, handling two big dogs. This one has taken quite a licking all ready, still looks great.
customer_reviews.author: LL3820

customer_reviews.title: Programming horrible
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to program. Plan to throw away unless I find someone to program it which is highly unlikely because I've already spent far to much time trying to program. But it is cute and fis my small wrist. Hope to find another that's comfortable and easy to program. Any suggestions would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Reams

customer_reviews.title: Daughter love this watch
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old daughter needed a watch for a technology free trip on which she couldn't take her phone. She really likes this watch. It's easy to read and looks good. She used it when she went to a water park and didn't have any issues. She wasn't swimming with it, but she was going down water slides and the watch definitely got very wet.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl T

customer_reviews.title: Nice small size for women and kids as well
customer_reviews.text: Bought it before vacation specifically for swimming, used for the whole week for swimming at the sea (not diving), they survived and still work. Nice small size for women and kids as well. Instructions are clear enough for 13 year old, as my daughter "stole" them from me and set up everything herself.
customer_reviews.author: ANNA K.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty watch, easy to use and great features
customer_reviews.text: Pretty watch, easy to use and great features. I like the light feature to see the time at night and the stopwatch has come in handy several times already. I have a small wrist so it is a perfect size, as it isn’t too chunky. Would have given 5 stars, but strap doesn’t always stay in place...easily slips out of the loop. However, the good outweighs that minor issue so I would buy it again! Overall, very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and really cute
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say how much I love this watch. I love the size of it since it is so hard to find a women’s watch that isn’t big. The time is easy to see and love how it shows the seconds since I’m a nurse assistant. It fits perfectly and is really cute. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Y.

product_meta.title: Armitron Sport Women's 45/7034 Digital Chronograph Resin Strap Watch
product_meta.description:
Quartz movement with digital multifuntional display




PRODUCT DETAILS
 *  User Manual [PDF ] 
 * Product Dimensions :4.09 x 4.02 x 2.76 inches; 2.65 Ounces
 * Item model number :45/7034BLK
 * Department :Womens
 * Batteries :1 Lithium Metal batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :July 15, 2013
 * Manufacturer :Armitron Sport
 * ASIN :B00CZ55IRS

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #3,162 in Sports & Outdoors (See Top 100 in Sports & Outdoors)  *  #3 inWomen's Outdoor Recreation Sport Watches 
    *  #6 inWomen's Wrist Watches 
    *  #3 inWomen's Sport Watches 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.4 out of 5 stars2,091 ratings Quartz movement with digital multifuntional display
feature_bullets: Slim watch featuring oval case with single zone LCD display, day/date/time/seconds, chronograph, alarm, second time zone, and backlight
25 millimeter resin case with acrylic dial window
Water resistant to 100 meter (330 feet): In general, suitable for swimming and snorkeling, but not scuba diving
